scripts.start-vm: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd web && npm start" "cd backend && lt --port 3001 --subdomain mainserverline3001" "cd web && lt --port 3000 --subdomain mainserverline3000"
scripts.start-mak: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd web && npm start" "cd backend && lt --port 3001 --subdomain maklocalhost3001" "cd web && lt --port 3000 --subdomain maklocalhost3000"
scripts.start-nut: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd web && npm start" "cd backend && lt --port 3001 --subdomain nutlocalhost3001" "cd web && lt --port 3000 --subdomain nutlocalhost3000"
scripts.start-poom: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd web && npm start" "cd backend && lt --port 3001 --subdomain poomlocalhost3001" "cd web && lt --port 3000 --subdomain poomlocalhost3000"
scripts.build-vm: concurrently "cd web && npm run build" "cd backend && forever start server.js && forever start localtunnel.js"
